sentences.en: The interrelationship between them are not completely clear.

sentences.en: Therefore the paper expatiate the interrelationship and mutual acting mechanism from two theory fields in detail.
sentences.cn: 从而从两个理论领域详细阐述了两者的内在关系和相互的影响机制.

trans.tran_cn: 相互关系[联系，影响]，干扰
trans.tran_en: a connection between two things that makes them affect each other
